name: Free Booking Plugin for Hotels, Restaurants and Car Rentals – eaSYNC Booking
author: Syntactics, Inc.

sections.description:
Simplify a Customer’s Booking Experience with eaSYNC Booking — a WordPress Booking Plugin for Hotels, Restaurants, and Car Rentals!

NOTE: This WordPress plugin requires a Paypal Merchant Account in order to get the Client ID

Homepage | Pricing for Car Booking | Pricing for Hotel Booking | Pricing for Restaurant Booking | Demo | Help Center

Key Benefits of eaSYNC Booking Plugin:

  • Car Rentals: The car rental module simplifies management with a visual representation of available and rented vehicles, aiding in efficient fleet allocation and reducing the chances of overbooking or conflicts in reservations.
  • Hotels: For hotels, the key benefit is the automation of check-in and check-out processes, allowing guests to easily find and book available rooms, which enhances the overall customer experience and operational efficiency.
  • Restaurants: The restaurant module’s interactive calendar and time slot system streamline the booking process, ensuring diners can reserve a table at their convenience, thereby improving table turnover and customer satisfaction.

We have a list of eaSYNC Booking’s capabilities, starting with features that are common across all modules and then the module-specific ones:

Common Features Across All Modules

  • Easy to install and use (Installation Service Available)
  • Fully responsive booking forms
  • Sleek UI
  • Booking entries are categorized into Active, Inactive, Pending, and Trash
  • Guests will receive emails once their reservation is confirmed
  • Automatic sorting of pending entries
  • Easy integration into posts/pages
  • Payment Gateway Integration
  • Option to turn specific modules on or off
  • Can set currency codes for products or services
  • Can customize email header and footer text
  • Auto currency and price change are based on geolocation; the use of third-party service comes from Free Currency Converter (https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/)
    • Free Currency Converter Terms of Service: https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/terms-of-service

Car Booking Plugin

The eaSYNC Booking’s Car Rental Module features a minimalistic yet bright design and an easy-to-follow rental process. It’s also simple for those who are starting out on WordPress.

Here are the features of the Car Rental module:

Front-end:

  • Calendar View of Reservation Slots
  • Confirmation Pages and Policies
  • Custom Search Form Title
  • Specify Car Model, Type, and Pickup Locations
  • Pre-set Default Time in Rental Forms
  • Input and Manage Driver Information

Back-end:

  • Calendar View of Customer Bookings
  • Can Manage and Cancel Bookings
  • Can Set and Customize Confirmation Pages and Policies
  • Can Integrate PayPal Payment Gateway
  • Can Customize and Schedule Email Notifications
  • Can Personalize Search Form Title
  • Can Define Default Time Parameters
  • Can Allow Users to Input Driver Information

Hotel Booking Plugin

The eaSYNC’s Hotel Booking Module prominently features an automated check-out date counter. It’s a display of the plugin’s automation capabilities, serving as a sneak peek of its overall convenience.

Here’s a full list of the Hotel Booking module’s features:

Front-end:

  • Calendar View of Reservation Slots
  • Confirmation Pages and Policies
  • Custom Search Form Title
  • Can Select and Customize Hotel Room Preferences (Number of Guests, Rooms, Beds, and Special Requests)

Back-end:

  • Calendar View of Customer Bookings
  • Can Manage and Cancel Bookings
  • Can Set and Customize Confirmation Pages and Policies
  • Can Integrate PayPal Payment Gateway
  • Can Customize and Schedule Email Notifications
  • Can Personalize Search Form Title
  • Can Configure Hotel Room Settings

Restaurant Booking Plugin

The Restaurant Reservation Module features a stunning and interactive visual representation of the date and time slots. It draws customers in, inviting them to reserve a table. We acknowledge that time is a valuable resource, so the booking forms are kept simple and require only the necessary information from diners!

Here’s the list of eaSYNC Booking features for the restaurant reservation module:

Front-end:

  • Calendar View of Reservation Slots
  • Confirmation Pages and Policies
  • Custom Search Form Title
  • Choose Dishes from the Custom Menu and Select Preferred Tables
  • Locate and Choose Specific Restaurant Branch Locations
  • Choose Available Time Slots for Bookings

Back-end:

  • Calendar View of Customer Bookings
  • Can Manage and Cancel Bookings
  • Can Set and Customize Confirmation Pages and Policies
  • Can Integrate PayPal Payment Gateway
  • Can Customize and Schedule Email Notifications
  • Can Personalize Search Form Title
  • Can Manage Menu and Table Configuration
  • Can Configure and Manage Branch Locations
  • Can Configure and Manage Restaurant’s Available Time Slots

The Best Part? It’s Absolutely Free!

Translations

  • English – default, always included

3rd Party Service

  • We used Free Currency Converter (https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/) for automatic price conversion based on user location.
    • No personal user information is involved in this service, just the price conversion.
    • Third-party terms of service:
      https://free.currencyconverterapi.com/terms-of-service.
  • We used geoPlugin (https://www.geoplugin.com/) to geolocate visitors. It allows you to provide customers with Geolocalised content that’s more relevant to their geographical location.
    • No personal user information is involved in this service, only the location.
    • Third-party Privacy Policy: https://www.geoplugin.com/privacy.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

Automatic Installation

  1. Login to WordPress admin panel
  2. Click on Plugins > Add New
  3. Find the plugin by typing ‘eaSYNC Booking’ on the search bar
  4. Click the ‘Install Now’ button
  5. After the successful installation, click on the Activate button to start using the plugin

Uploading the WordPress Plugin

  1. Login to WordPress admin panel
  2. Click on Plugins > Add New
  3. Click on the ‘Upload Plugin’ button
  4. Once redirected to the plugin upload page, click the Choose File button and select the eaSYNC Booking plugin file
  5. Click on the ‘Install Now’ button
  6. After the successful installation, click on the Activate Plugin link to start using the plugin

How to use this plugin

Adding Shortcode

  1. Create a full width page (optional)
  2. Copy and paste the shortcodes below

For Hotel Room

Shortcode: [easync_hotel_code]
To add hotel room type, go to auto generated eaSYNC Hotel in your sidebar

For Car Rental

Shortcode: [easync_car_code]
To add car rental, go to auto generated eaSYNC Car Rental in your sidebar

For Restaurant Reservation

Shortcode: [easync_restau_code]
To add menu type, go to auto generated eaSYNC Restao in your sidebar
sections.faq:
How can I embed eaSYNC Booking modules on a page or post?

To embed a specific eaSYNC module, such as Car Rental, go to Page or Post in the admin panel and use this shortcode: “[easync_car_code]” (minus the double quotes).

Here are the other modules’ shortcodes:
[easync_hotel_code] = Hotel Booking
[easync_restau_code] = Restaurant Reservation

Will this WordPress booking system work for me?

We’re very sure it will! We made the eaSYNC Booking plugin as flexible as possible.

You can use it to book hotel rooms, restaurant tables, and rental cars or vehicles. If you have multiple businesses, especially in line with hotels, restaurants, and car rentals, eaSYNC Booking is well-suited for your needs.

What payment methods does the plugin support?

The eaSYNC Booking plugin supports PayPal.

How will I know that a rental car has been returned?

Our plugin has a monitoring feature for overseeing expected car returns.

Why is the eaSYNC Booking plugin not working?

Your WordPress version may be one reason why our booking plugin isn’t working on your site. Our plugin runs on version 6.0 or higher, so upgrading your WordPress version might fix the issue.

There may also be conflicts with eaSYNC Booking and your existing plugins.

If you’re still experiencing errors, you can post a ticket on our support (https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/easync-booking) so we can address your concern accordingly.

Can you provide plugin installation services on my website?

Yes! You can email us at (inquiries@syntacticsinc.com) for a quotation on our installation services.

Will you add additional features to the plugin?

Yes, we will! Recently, we released version 2 of the free eaSYNC Booking plugin. In addition, we’ve also released a premium version! Stay tuned for more updates to our WordPress plugin.

Do you offer support?

Yes, we do! You can post a ticket via our support page (https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/easync-booking), and we’ll work to address your concern in a timely manner.

Are the forms GDPR compliant?

We comply with the Data Privacy Act and ensure that we keep our customers’ personal information confidential. Our Privacy Policy can be found here.

*Added feature to allow customers to request a cancel to their rentals
*Added feature to allow admin to set the number of days allowed (prior to rented date) for the customer to cancel rentals

*Added feature to allow admin to view, approve or decline cancellation requests
*Added feature to allow admin to customize cancellation emails to be sent to the customer upon approval or declined cancellation requests

*Added feature to send emails to customer and admin to cancel rental request
*Added feature to send emails to customer and admin when cancel rental request is approved or declined
